about.title: About
paragraphs: Software developer with 9+ of work experience. I'm graduated as a Games Development technologist. I started my career programming for desktops, and today I work with web full-stack development.
I'm Brazilian, I live and work in my home country, but I want to try opportunities abroad. I have German citizenship and passport, which makes it easier to accomplish my goal.

I always try to update my knowledge in software development technology to improve my skills. I consider continuous learning my great virtue, not only professionally, but also in other life aspects. My main goal, aside from career growing, is to be certain I did a well-done job, and that I did my best to achieve it.

activities: SPA development in React and PHP with extensive creation and integration of own and third party REST APIs.
Back-end unit test code coverage.
Python automation scripts and microservice using Flask.
Docker containers environment, MySQL for persistent data and Elasticsearch for full text search.
PHP with MVC pattern, and jQuery with Bootstrap.
Legal data integration with third party APIs and scraping of websites.
Diverse Python routine scripts, including data migration between databases and e-mail management.
PostgreSQL schemas creation and maintenance.
Development of a bulding energy management software suite.
Development of a logic visual programmer with draggable blocks, including its linker, compiler and debugger.
Development of many tools for electronic equipment setups.
Database structure creation, update and maintenance.
Desktop development in C++
Web development in PHP, JavaScript (vanilla and jQuery), HTML, CSS/SCSS, JSON and XML.
Direct support for clients.
Search, analyse and identify system problems.
Qt Creator (C++) programming for software aimed at showing and collecting lab equipments data, like test results.
Bash script programming.
C# and JavaScript programming with Unity 3D engine.
One game released on the App Store.
Institute's site management and graphic components creation.

about.title: Sobre
paragraphs: Desenvolvedor de software com mais de 9 anos de experiência no mercado. Tenho graduação tecnológica em Jogos Digitais. Iniciei minha carreira com programação para desktop, e hoje trabalho com desenvolvimento full-stack para web.
Sou brasileiro, moro e trabalho no meu país natal, mas quero conhecer outras oportunidades fora do país. Possuo cidadania e passaporte alemães, o que facilita minha pretensão, caso ocorra.

Procuro sempre atualizar meus conhecimentos em tecnologia de desenvolvimento e aprimorar minhas habilidades. Considero o aprendizado contínuo minha maior virtude, não só na área profissional, mas também em outros aspectos da vida. Meu objetivo, além de crescimento na carreira, é de estar com a consciência tranquila de que meu trabalho foi bem feito e que me esforcei ao máximo para isso.
